IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.modify_guild_abillity') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.modify_guild_abillity GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.modify_guild_abillity @character_id dbo.id_t, @abillity INT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE Guild_Members SET abillity = @abillity WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
